* Council Members!


Council Members!
================

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Mayor | Katherine Ragston | kward@hempsteadcitytx.gov |
| Position 1 | David Shelburne | dshelburne@hempsteadcitytx.gov |
| Position 2 | Veronica Klausmeyer | vklausmeyer@hempsteadcitytx.gov |
| Position 3 | Mayor Pro Tem Lonnie Garfield | lgarfield@hempsteadcitytx.gov |
| Position 4 | Rooster Smith | rsmith@hempsteadcitytx.gov |
| Position 5 | Nora Hodges | nhodges@hempsteadcitytx.gov |

                             All City Council Members can be contacted by email.
